\flight\net

\flight\netRequest

The Request class represents an HTTP request. Data from all the super globals $_GET, $_POST, $_COOKIE, and $_FILES are stored and accessible via the Request object.

The default request properties are: url - The URL being requested base - The parent subdirectory of the URL method - The request method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) referrer - The referrer URL ip - IP address of the client ajax - Whether the request is an AJAX request scheme - The server protocol (http, https) user_agent - Browser information type - The content type length - The content length query - Query string parameters data - Post parameters cookies - Cookie parameters files - Uploaded files secure - Connection is secure accept - HTTP accept parameters proxy_ip - Proxy IP address of the client
